feed.title: WhaleDeck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.11
entry.content:
• Fixes for Firefly III v6.2.0
  • Piggybank feature requires Firefly III v6.2.2 to work due to a bug in Firefly III.
  • The new native currency feature has not been tested at all.

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.12
New release for Waterfly III: v1.1.0
entry.content:
This release brings quite a few new features. Most noticeably, the Transaction screen has been revamped completely to make the transaction easier to input and to make from/to clearer - it now behaves more than the Firefly III webinterface.

Full Changelog: * Feature: New transaction screen (#22, #401) * Feature: Allow to modify main dashboard (order & visibility of cards) (#334) * Features for Notification Listener: * Option to not add note for notification-added transactions (#374) * Option to add transaction from notification without asking (#486) * Feature: Show used budget in relation to time in month (#485) * Feature: Only show transactions for current month in Category view (#507) * Feature: FAQ page * Change: Bills are now called subscriptions to be in line with Firefly III. * Fix: Display error on transaction screen for split transactions with foreign currency (#526) * Fix: Login save issues (#523) * Fix: Support Firefly III v6.2.0 * Piggybank feature requires Firefly III v6.2.2 to work due to a bug in Firefly III. * The new native currency feature has not been tested at all. * Firefly III v6.2.7 has a bug that makes the transaction list unusable. Please update to Firefly III v6.2.8. * Fixes for Notification Listener: * Service now properly starts when enabling it (#506) * Parsing for some special edge-cases (#417) * Fix: Proper way to detect auth failure, allows running Firefly III behind a redirect page (#497) * Dependency updates (especially settings handler) (#492, #432) * Flutter version upgrade

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.1.1
New release for Waterfly III: v1.1.2
entry.content:
• ⚠️ Due to a dependency update, the login details will be deleted with this version. Please issue a new personal access token and use it to log back in - no other settings will be lost! ⚠️ (#572)
  • New: Date filter for Transaction list (Last Month, Last Year etc.) (#581 & #594)
  • New: Dashboard Chart Tag Summary (hidden by default) (#573)
  • New: Transaction list for single account shows current balance, thank you @Arkarr (#568 & #570)
  • Improved: Back from Settings now goes back to previous screen instead of exiting the app (#556)
  • Improved: Better "Saving" state for transaction page, thank you @Aegeontis (#596)
  • Improved: Support for additional banking apps (#584, others)
  • Bugfixes (#552, #574 & #577, #585, #596 thank you @Aegeontis)
  • Version updates of dependencies, flutter etc.
